name: Pac-Man But Hacks
description:
Just because it is a scratch projects doesn't mean it ain't good!

Pac-Man has somehow gotten access to hacks and the ghosts want to challenge him to prove that he has access to hacks.

Hacks include:

Wall Hack

Speed Hack (Hold Z)

NOTE: TO RESTART GAME, YOU MUST CLICK FLAG 2 OR 3 TIMES. THIS IS AN UNKNOWN PROBLEM.
